songs.title: Look Again*
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
It comes from your soul
Mm, hm

[Verse 1]
I, serve my time for all my cries
Standing here feeling so terrified
And no one knows where the answer lies-ies-ies
How you gon' tell me what I gotta live without?
When you know half the things that I live without
I highly doubt, that you have the same things holding you down
This is me telling you, you would never understand
This is what they see from the outside, lookin' in
Unexplainable, unexplainable
Unexplainable, even if you look again

[Chorus]
Even if you look again
Even if you look again (Yeah)
Even if you look again (Oh, oh)

[Verse 2]
In the back of my head, there's something haunting
And no one wants me, to end up lonely
I'm searching for my peace, somebody help me
Feels like I'm about to-
